thread.section_title: UpRight Law Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of UpRight Law | www.uprightlaw.com | 4 of 36
thread.title: Keith Gunter :
thread.title_full: UpRight Law reviewed by Keith Gunter :

author: Keith Gunter :
title: Keith Gunter :
text: From my initial contact, everyone was so supportive of my situation. I had decided to go one direction, but after giving all the facts, they recommended I go another. I was a little taken back by the fees but after looking around realize you get what you pay for. I feel in good hands, comfortable with payment schedule and appreciative of UpRight for helping me to work through this unfortunate situation. Thank you!
